column4: can I configure apt-get so that it always downloads k7 if availible instead of i386?
once k7 is booted & running properly you can remove i386 if you like, otherwise 'apt-get upgrade' will keep them both up to date
no, remove it with synaptic or apt-get
the full boat is: linux-386 linux-headers-386 linux-image-386 linux-restricted-modules-386
